Name: Treasure Trap
About the game: Treasure trap is a 2d platform game consisting of difficult levels full of unexpected traps. Pudi (our main character) is an adventure lover who goes after the gold in the treasure map he got from a traveler. He now faces a dungeon of various challenges, the Color Dungeon ! Will he finally be able to reach the gold he seeks or will everything be left with pain?

Meta Description: Looking for information on Treasure Trap? Check out the release date (Dec 16, 2022), developer insights from Barış Erden, and a complete game summary.
